public class LogInitializer

Implements startup initialization for log4j.

Method Detail

doInit

public void doInit()
Initializes log4j as specified in the property file. See the log4j documentation for a detailed description of the contents of the property file. If you would like to see initialization info in the log add the following to the property file.
log4j.configDebug
